titleStmt.title: His Majesties two speeches one to the knights, gentlemen, and freeholders of the county of Nottingham at Newark ; the other to the knights gentlemen and freeholders of the county of Lincoln at Lincoln.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
